mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(p.name) as NUM,FROM_DISTRICT as countyName FROM move m inner join people p on m.`FID` = p.`FID` GROUP BY m.`FROM_DISTRICT`
SELECT FROM_DISTRICT as countyName,count(p.name) as NUM,FROM_TOWN as townName FROM move m inner join people p on m.`FID` = p.`FID` GROUP BY m.`FROM_DISTRICT`,m.FROM_TOWN

SELECT FROM_DISTRICT as countyName,count(p.name) as NUM,FROM_TOWN as townName,FROM_VILLAGE as villageName FROM move m inner join people p on m.`FID` = p.`FID` GROUP BY m.`FROM_DISTRICT`,m.FROM_TOWN,m.FROM_VILLAGE
